lead_paragraph: The company joins Google, Facebook and others in disclosing when users of email and other services have probably been targeted by hackers working on behalf of governments.
snippet: The company joins Google, Facebook and others in disclosing when users of email and other services have probably been targeted by hackers working on behalf of governments.

headline.main: Microsoft to Notify Users of Government Hackings
headline.print_headline: Microsoft to Notify Users of Government Hackings

abstract: Microsoft joins growing list of Internet companies who will notify users if they have been targets of state-sponsored online attacks; such attacks have increased in recent years, and involve sophisticated forms of deception to gain control of online accounts.
